about_the_game:
Author's Note
1. Because there is no handheld device such as Steam handheld, I don't know the degree of support, I hope that the conditional old iron can help take a look when I have leisure, thank you!
2. Regarding the operation configuration, if there is any omission or negligence, please ask, thank you!
3. Regarding multi-language support, most of the texts such as task descriptions and item descriptions are currently supported in English, (in the bottom right gear ⚙️ button) but some interface UIs are temporarily not fully supported due to the typographic design. In addition, Chinese characters are vast and profound, and many times it is really difficult to translate into foreign languages, and forced translation has lost its essence. If you can, it is recommended to use Chinese game...
WeChat public account: 文刀山宗

Quick Start
1. Go to the room refrigerator and change a mushroom.
2. Pick up all the food on the ground on the way, and don't let it go if it is hidden under the furniture.
3. Click the eye button at the bottom to complete the novice task, be sure to pay attention to the task introduction, follow the introduction, the last one is to press the J key to 'make' the phone, after completion will get a hit title.
4. Go to other rooms to complete cat and cat teaching tasks, and search for food in other rooms by the way.
5. Enter the random room, kill at least one 8-bit body (familiar with the battle), you can enter the main line. The main line entrance is behind the bookcase (careful friends will find that there are actually glimpses in the promotional video)

background
Twenty years after the nuclear contamination incident, the world is finally coming to an end: Then came the apartment with unlimited rooms:
All are forced into a free, warm and cozy paradise apartment world full of hidden food and cute little monsters:
This is humanity's second chance: Oh, maybe the nth time?..
Fast forward 100 years: As a 4th generation apartment native, you were born:

glance
Rule 1, it is forbidden to leave, no matter how many times you open the door, you are only entering another similar room... (Unless entering the more realistic world through the main story)
Rule 2, SAN, as long as you are in an apartment, you will be affected by SAN... (unless created and entered into the world of homemade dramas)
Rule 3, lost, long years, countless times the end of the world, enter the apartment and then be assimilated into 8 body monsters... (You can encounter them in your apartment)
Rule 4, endless, ██████████████████████████

Fast action
*8 monsters in random rooms will eat food on the ground as well as companions' drops, and then boost health bars:
*Most of the food obtained in the apartment world will spoil after experiencing spoiled tides, and spoilage is also an important production material. Either eat it before it goes bad, or let it spoil and sublimate.
* Go to the refrigerator immediately to redeem a free small mushroom, stack the attack buff on the head, and exchange it for more with soul eggs, the small mushroom will become bigger.

and
The inner world pushes the main line; The apartment world is developing; Do whatever you want for a homemade drama;
The game has a built-in self-made drama editor without threshold, which can freely design monsters, bubbling dialogues and stage text sets and other elements through the modification of the template to create your own homemade drama world, and the homemade drama code is plain text, you can easily share your homemade drama world through various ways!
